name: am yisrael fucking ripped
description:
it's you and god in a backyard brawl. 3...2...1...fight!

this is a lyric game about having a fistfight with god late at night. let your anger fuel you, and scream and shout at hashem about everything wrong. then proclaim your new name to be Israel, for you have striven with beings divine and human, and you have prevailed.
